snippet: After disclosing his love for a man, the singer Frank Ocean has drawn support from a hip-hop world known for its aggressive heterosexuality.
abstract: R&B singer Frank Ocean has drawn support from the hip-hop music community after coming out as gay; admission was a risky move for his career, given the hypermasculinity present in the world of urban music and fact that no other mainstream R&B artists have acknowledged having homosexual relationships; acceptance of Ocean seems to echo a broader shift in attitudes toward homosexuality and gay culture.
lead_paragraph: After disclosing his love for a man, the singer Frank Ocean has drawn support from a hip-hop world known for its aggressive heterosexuality.

headline.seo: Frank Ocean Draws Praise for Declaring His Homosexuality
headline.main: Hip-Hop World Gives Gay Singer Support
headline.print_headline: Hip-Hop World Gives Gay Singer Support
